description: The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) requires IT Professional Services to assist with the upgrade, configuration, expansion and management of its existing Archibus software for testing in the CRA environment. In particular, the CRA requires professional services to plan, design, build, test, implement, configure, support, enhance, and maintain their booking system and related modules for the Agency in order to create a functional booking system for evaluation purposes only. ...
duration_in_months: We anticipate that the work will be completed approximately 105 days for the initial contract award date and of March 31, 2024.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Title: 
Archibus IT Professional Services

## Reference Number: 
cb-181-98026240 (Amendment 4)

## Publication Date: 
30 November 2023

## Tender Closing Date: 
15 December 2023 at 14:00:00

## Procurement Scope:
The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites responses from vendors who have been pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement to provide IT Professional Services in support of the upgrade, configuration, expansion, and management of its existing Archibus software for testing in the CRA environment.

## Proposed Scope:
The CRA requires professional services to plan, design, build, test, implement, configure, support, enhance, and maintain its booking system and related modules for the Agency. This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories:

* Level 2 ERP Functional Analyst
* Level 2 ERP Programmer Analyst
* Level 2 Project Executive
* Level 2 Quality Assurance Specialist/Analyst

## Shortlisted Suppliers:
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Alika Internet Technologies Inc.
* BRYCA Solutions Inc. (in joint venture)
* Cofomo Inc.
* CompuStaff Corp.
* Dargan Industries Inc.
* HubSpoke Inc.
* Kainos Canada Inc.
* Lumina IT Inc.
* Maverin Inc.
* Mindwire Systems Ltd.
* PrecisionIT Inc. (in joint venture)
* Tato Recruiting Inc. (in joint venture)
* The Halifax Computer Consulting Group Inc.
* TPG Technology Consulting Ltd.
* Wipro Solutions Canada Ltd.

## Contract Details:

* Contract duration: approximately 105 days (from contract award to 31 March 2024)
* One (1) irrevocable one (1) year option to extend the terms of contract under the same conditions

Note: The work is not being performed by a contracted resource, and there has been no incumbent performing the duties during the last 24 months.

Please format your output in nice markdown format as requested. Note that I only provided a general advice to refer to constants of your taste when writing your response.

---

Here is the final result to the prompt you provided:

Archibus IT Professional Services
